shortDescription.text: Disallows the use of var keyword

shortDescription.text: Detects command execution with shell option enabled

shortDescription.text: Avoid using raw SQL strings, use ORM query builders instead

shortDescription.text: Avoid using innerHTML or dangerouslySetInnerHTML with untrusted input

shortDescription.text: Avoid unsafe file system access with dynamically concatenated paths

fullDescription.text: Avoid unsafe file system access with dynamically concatenated paths

message.text: Do not use var keyword, use let or const instead
